name: Antechamber
longDesc: You step through the gate and into a chamber of finely carved stone.  This room that was once designed to impress visitors now holds a distinctly ominous air. Rows of statues seem to stand guard over this long-forgotten place and make it hard to shake the feeling of being watched.  They send a clear message: you are not welcome here.
shortDesc: You re-enter the hall of ominous statues that guard the entrance into this forgotten ruin.

shelves.name: Mount
shelves.desc: It's a metal torch mount hanging along one of the walls by the entrance to the room.

shelves.name: Tattered Carpet
shelves.desc: It's a Persian carpet with an elaborate design, fading away into shreds of nothing.

doors.name: Opened Stone Gate
doors.desc: Behind you is the large stone gate that opened the gateway to this hidden castle.
doors.unlock_desc: The gate has already been opened.

doors.name: Stone Archway
doors.desc: Leading to the Nexus is a large, stone archway that is enscribed with words that don't appear to be from any language you've come across even with all of your years of studying this place.
